mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imsure_psychologic_results (psychologic_results_id, user_id, extraversion, agreeableness, conscientiousness, neuroticism, openness, insurance_id, insurance_id2, insurance_id3) VALUES ((SELECT psychologic_id_function FROM dual), #{userId}, #{extraversion}, #{agreeableness}, #{conscientiousness}, #{neuroticism}, #{openness}, #{insurance_id}, #{insurance_id2}, #{insurance_id3})
